forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 67F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 21C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 70F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 22C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 71F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
